long_description: Quixote brings together the finest synthetic microfibers and a lightweight cover to create an incredibly comfortable pillow. High-quality, downlike PrimaLoft(R) microfibers compress for easy packing yet maintain loft for maximum comfort; fiber structure is hypoallergenic and machine washable. Technically engineered ripstop polyester microfiber cover is durable, lightweight and water resistant; assembled with double needle tailoring and nylon thread. Corner loop lets you hang and store your pillow, keeping it clean and dry. Pillow includes a 100% cotton, 400-thread count pillowcase.
short_description: Quixote brings together the finest synthetic microfibers and a lightweight cover to create an incredibly comfortable pillow.
